description: Compared with other paths for refugees crossing the Mediterranean, the journey from Bodrum, Turkey, to Kos is relatively organized and easy.
title: Migrants Find an Unbridled Route to Greece
title_page: Migrants Find an Unbridled Route to Greece - The New York Times
text:
Migrants Find an Unbridled Route to Greece
Compared with other paths for refugees crossing the Mediterranean, the journey from Bodrum, Turkey, to Kos is relatively organized and easy.
